info: Is obtained by fighting a dragon in the Dragons Nest which is located in the end, to get this sword you need to atleast place 2 eyes and get first place, though it is reccomended to place 4 due to each eye giving 100 dragon weight, dragon weight is the coding for what you can possibly get.
